text: Hi, is there any timeline on when the API v3 will be updated with engagements?

:wave::skin-tone-5:  Hi all we are in the process of introducing newly refreshed Ecosystem APIs into private beta and we are looking for volunteers to help us test these endpoints:
Currently we have the following on deck:
• Webhooks 
• CRM Cards (formerly CRM extenstions) 
• Timeline 
• Coming soon Ecom bridge + Video Conferencing Ext. 
If you are interested in participating in the feedback period, please fill ou this form: <https://forms.gle/QfWg2FBnHDQLcULC7>
Thank you! : :pray::skin-tone-5:
